about_the_game:
*All characters in this game are 18 or older.

Plot
"Me? The surgical department?"
Momo was a new nurse at Harukaze Hospital. She was a hard-working girl who took care of her mother.
But she had a weakness, a phobia of men. Then one day, she gets transferred to the surgical department after making a mistake.
Will she be able to overcome her trauma and save her patients...?

Character
Momo
A new nurse just got transferred to the surgical department from the internal medicine department.
She is a hard worker and takes care of her mom.
A talented nurse but has a phobia of men.

Sakura
A colleague that works in the surgical department. She teaches Momo the ropes.
Always smiling and popular with patients.

System
- Resolution 1280 x 720
- Game consists mainly of conversations and exploration
- Events can be easily found at the "!" mark.
- 1 type of ending. In-game choices don't affect the outcome.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following sexual content
・Strong language 
・Sexual language

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: ４ GB RAM
